articles.title: Robbie Shakespeare, ‘Wickedest Bass’ in Reggae, Dead at 68 - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Alongside his Riddim Twins counterpart Sly Dunbar, the bassist played with everyone from Black Uhuru to Bob Dylan across more than four decades
